name: Ultimate Klondike Solitaire Pro- Classic Card Play
name_original: Ultimate Klondike Solitaire Pro- Classic Card Play
description:
Pro Version! No-Ads, non-stop entertainment!!

Klondike Solitaire is a super addictive and classic card game variation of Solitaire that will keep you entertained for a very long time. This game requires skill and patience to win! Now you can play Klondike Solitaire anywhere at any time of the day.

This classic card game is ios8/9 compatible.
Features include:
+ ios8 compatible
+ Preview hints
+ Autoplay
+ Unlimited undo
+ Smooth card animations
+ Drag and drop or simple select and move controls
+ Move whole stacks quickly with simple tap controls
+ Customize your colors
+ Timing and scoring modes
+ Supports all devices
+ Landscape and Portrait modes
+ Leaderboards for high scores challenges with your friends
+ Great tutorials for each different game

Don't pass this one up. It's one you will come back to and play again and again when you are looking for a good challenge or when you are bored. Klondike Solitaire is a great addition to your card game collection. Get it now, no ads and just non-stop entertainment. Thanks for playing!
